personal.name: Ni単o Marcos
personal.title: IT Student & Aspiring Full Stack Developer
personal.summary: IT student at St. Paul University Philippines with a passion for modern web development and AI integration. Currently building projects with Next.js, React, and TypeScript while learning advanced concepts. Competitive robotics programmer with 4th place finish in international STEAM Challenge 2018 (118 teams from 5 countries).
personal.elevator_pitch: As an IT student, I combine academic learning with hands-on project development. I've competed internationally in robotics programming and now focus on modern web technologies. While I don't have formal work experience yet, I demonstrate my skills through personal projects involving Next.js, AI integration, and full-stack development. I'm highly competitive, self-driven, and eager to contribute to real-world projects.

achievements_star.situation: Need to demonstrate modern web development skills to potential employers and learn OAuth implementation

content_chunks.title: Personal Profile
content_chunks.content: Name: Ni単o Marcos. Title: IT Student & Aspiring Full Stack Developer. Location: Tuguegarao City, Philippines. Summary: IT student at St. Paul University Philippines with a passion for modern web development and AI integration. Currently building projects with Next.js, React, and TypeScript while learning advanced concepts. Competitive robotics programmer with 4th place finish in international STEAM Challenge 2018 (118 teams from 5 countries).. Elevator Pitch: As an IT student, I combine academic learning with hands-on project development. I've competed internationally in robotics programming and now focus on modern web technologies. While I don't have formal work experience yet, I demonstrate my skills through personal projects involving Next.js, AI integration, and full-stack development. I'm highly competitive, self-driven, and eager to contribute to real-world projects.
